actions.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Finance.

official_title: A bill to provide for the liquidation or reliquidation of certain entries of truck tires entered on or after November 3, 2004, and on or before September 14, 2005.

summary.text: Provides for the liquidation or reliquidation of, and refund of any duties and interest paid on, certain entries of truck tires.

titles.title: A bill to provide for the liquidation or reliquidation of certain entries of truck tires entered on or after November 3, 2004, and on or before September 14, 2005.
